text: tum unhen sab logon se badhakar jeevan ka lobhee paoge, yahaan tak ki ve is sambandh mein shirk karanevaalo se bhee badhe hue hai. unaka to pratyek vyakti yah ichchha rakhata hai ki kya hee achchha hota ki us hazaar varsh kee aayu mile, jabaki yadi use yah aayu praapt bhee jae, to bhee vah apane aapako yaatana se nahin bacha sakata. allaah dekh raha hai, jo kuchh ve kar rahe hai
